Message:
Soon afterwards,
I traveled from
battlefield to battlefield.

At first, I thought I’d quickly
run out of strength.
But for some reason,
I was light on my feet.

The pain left my body
only when I was fighting.

It was as if I’d returned
to the time when I was
free of this disease.

But the moment
the fighting stopped,
the disease would come back
and continue to suffocate me.

I’ve lost count of the times
I cursed the gods for forcing
this fate onto me.

But, I’ll be grateful only
because they’ve let me
choose how I die.

How lucky am I to be
able to die on the battlefield!

By dying in a way that
outshines the founder’s
moment of death,
I will outshine her legend!

as they witness the most
beautiful death of all!
